modName: Legolas Textures - Armor plus Bow and Arrows
summary: Changes the male nightingale armor to resemble Legolas. Aslo includes ebony bow and ebony arrow replacement to replicates Legolas.
descriptionHtml:
I did not like any of the nightingale re-colors out there, so I decided to make my own. Nothing high quality here- just some editing and recoloring to make the armor, bow, and arrows to look as close to Legolas as possible. I was happy with the results, so I thought I would share. Enjoy!

------
INSTALLATION
-Place the meshes and textures folder into your Skyrim/Data/ directory
author: kokorozukai
